MAN.TITLE: max_flow

PARAM_DESCRIPTION.SP: : value of the maximum flow it is exists
: row vector of the value of the flow on the arcs

DESCRIPTION.P: max_flow returns the value of maximum flow v from node number i to node number j if it exists, and the value of the flow on each arc as a row vector phi. All the computations are made with integer numbers. The graph must be directed. If the problem is not feasible, flag is equal to 0, otherwise it is equal to 1.

The bounds of the flow are given by the min_cap and max_cap fields of the edges_data_structure. The value of the maximum capacity must be greater than or equal to the value of the minimum capacity. If the value of min_cap or max_cap is not given, they are assumed to be equal to 0 on each edge.
